mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user`(nick, phone_number, gender, avatar_pic_url, birthday, created_time, update_time) VALUE (#{nick}, #{phoneNumber}, #{gender}, #{avatarPicUrl}, #{birthday}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, nick, phone_number phoneNumber, gender, avatar_pic_url avatarPicUrl, birthday FROM `user` WHERE phone_number=#{phoneNumber}
mapper.update: UPDATE `user` SET nick=#{nick}, gender=#{gender}, avatar_pic_url=#{avatarPicUrl}, birthday=#{birthday}, update_time=NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT id, nick, phone_number phoneNumber, gender, avatar_pic_url avatarPicUrl, birthday FROM `user` WHERE id=#{id}
